00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include <l4/cxx/avl_tree>
00023 #include <l4/cxx/std_ops>
00024 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_server>
00025 #include <l4/cxx/string>
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00028 #include <l4/re/namespace>
00029 
00030 #include <cstddef>
00031 
00032 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00033 
00034 class Dbg;
00035 class Err;
00036 
00037 namespace Names {
00038 
00042 class Name : public cxx::String
00043 {
00044 public:
00045 
00046   Name(const char *name = "") : String(name, __builtin_strlen(name)) {}
00047   Name(const char *name, unsigned long len) : String(name, len) {}
00048   Name(cxx::String const &n) : String(n) {}
00049   char const *name() const { return start(); }
00050   bool operator < (Name const &r) const;
00051 };
00052 
00053 
00057 class Obj
00058 {
00059 protected:
00060   unsigned _f;
00061   union
00062   {
00063     l4_cap_idx_t _cap;
00064     L4::Server_object *_obj;
00065   };
00066 
00067 
00068 public:
00069   enum Flags
00070   {
00071     F_rw        = L4Re::Namespace::Rw,
00072     F_strong    = L4Re::Namespace::Strong,
00073 
00074     F_trusted   = L4Re::Namespace::Trusted,
00075 
00076     F_rights_mask = F_rw | F_strong | F_trusted,
00077 
00078     F_cap        = 0x100,
00079     F_local      = 0x200,
00080     F_replacable = 0x400,
00081     F_base_mask  = 0xf00,
00082   };
00083 
00084 
00085   unsigned flags() const { return _f; }
00086   void restrict_flags(unsigned max_rights)
00087   { _f &= (~F_rights_mask | (max_rights & F_rights_mask)); }
00088 
00089   bool is_rw() const { return _f & F_rw; }
00090   bool is_strong() const { return _f & F_strong; }
00091 
00092   bool is_valid() const { return _f & F_cap; }
00093   bool is_complete() const { return is_valid(); }
00094   bool is_local() const { return _f & F_local; }
00095   bool is_replacable() const { return _f & F_replacable; }
00096   bool is_trusted() const { return _f & F_trusted; }
00097 
00098   L4::Server_object *obj() const { if (is_local()) return _obj; return 0; }
00099   L4::Cap<void> cap() const
00100   {
00101     if (!is_local())
00102       return L4::Cap<void>(_cap);
00103     if (!_obj)
00104       return L4::Cap<void>::Invalid;
00105     return _obj->obj_cap();
00106   }
00107 
00108 
00109   void set(Obj const &o, unsigned flags)
00110   {
00111     *this = o;
00112     restrict_flags(flags);
00113   }
00114 
00115   explicit Obj(unsigned flags = 0)
00116   : _f(flags), _cap(L4_INVALID_CAP)
00117   {}
00118 
00119   Obj(unsigned f, L4::Cap<void> const &cap)
00120   : _f((f & ~F_base_mask) | F_cap), _cap(cap.cap())
00121   {}
00122 
00123   Obj(unsigned f, L4::Server_object *o)
00124   : _f((f & ~F_base_mask) | F_cap | F_local), _obj(o)
00125   {}
00126 
00127   void reset(unsigned flags)
00128   {
00129     _f = (_f & F_replacable) | (flags & ~(F_cap | F_local));
00130     _cap = L4_INVALID_CAP;
00131   }
00132 
00133 
00134 };
00135 
00136 
00140 class Entry : public cxx::Avl_tree_node
00141 {
00142 private:
00143   friend class Name_space;
00144   Name _n;
00145   Obj  _o;
00146 
00147   Entry *_next_link;
00148   bool _dynamic;
00149 
00150 public:
00151   Entry(Name const &n, Obj const &o, bool dynamic = false)
00152   : _n(n), _o(o), _next_link(0), _dynamic(dynamic) {}
00153 
00154   Name const &name() const { return _n; }
00155   Obj const *obj() const { return &_o; }
00156   Obj *obj() { return &_o; }
00157   void obj(Obj const &o) { _o = o; }
00158 
00159   Entry *next_link() const { return _next_link; }
00160 
00161   void add_link(Entry *o)
00162   { o->_next_link = _next_link; _next_link = o; }
00163 
00164   void set_next_link(Entry *o)
00165   { _next_link = o; }
00166 
00167   bool is_placeholder() const
00168   { return !obj()->is_complete(); }
00169 
00170   bool is_dynamic() const { return _dynamic; }
00171 
00172   bool link(Entry *src);
00173   void set(Obj const &o);
00174 
00175 private:
00176   void * operator new (size_t s);
00177   void operator delete(void *b);
00178 
00179 };
00180 
00181 struct Names_get_key
00182 {
00183   typedef Name Key_type;
00184   static Key_type const &key_of(Entry const *e)
00185   { return e->name(); }
00186 };
00187 
00188 
00192 class Name_space
00193 {
00194   friend class Entry;
00195 
00196 private:
00197   typedef cxx::Avl_tree<Entry, Names_get_key> Tree;
00198   Tree _tree;
00199 
00200 protected:
00201   L4Re::Util::Dbg const &_dbg;
00202   L4Re::Util::Err const &_err;
00203 
00204 public:
00205 
00206   typedef Tree::Const_iterator Const_iterator;
00207 
00208   Const_iterator begin() const { return _tree.begin(); }
00209   Const_iterator end() const { return _tree.end(); }
00210 
00211   Name_space(L4Re::Util::Dbg const &dbg, L4Re::Util::Err const &err)
00212   : _dbg(dbg), _err(err)
00213   {}
00214 
00215   virtual ~Name_space() {}
00216 
00217   Entry *find(Name const &name) const  { return _tree.find_node(name); }
00218   Entry *remove(Name const &name) { return _tree.remove(name); }
00219   Entry *find_iter(Name const &name) const;
00220   bool insert(Entry *e)  { return _tree.insert(e).second; }
00221 
00222   void dump(bool rec = false, int indent = 0) const;
00223 
00224 protected:
00225   // server support --------------------------------------------
00226   virtual Entry *alloc_dynamic_entry(Name const &n, unsigned flags) = 0;
00227   virtual void free_dynamic_entry(Entry *e) = 0;
00228   virtual int get_capability(L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage const &cap_fp, L4::Cap<void> *cap,
00229                              L4::Server_object **lo = 0) = 0;
00230   virtual int save_capability(L4::Cap<void> *cap) = 0;
00231   virtual void free_capability(L4::Cap<void> cap) = 0;
00232 
00233   int insert_entry(Name const &name, unsigned flags, Entry **e);
00234 
00235 public:
00236   // server interface ------------------------------------------
00237   int query(L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios, char *buffer, size_t blen);
00238   int link_entry(L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios, char *buffer, size_t blen);
00239   int register_entry(L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios, char *buffer, size_t blen);
00240   int unlink_entry(L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios, char *buffer, size_t max_len);
00241   int dispatch(l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios, char *buffer,
00242                size_t blen);
00243 
00244 };
00245 
00246 }}}
